title: Enclave taking applications for Analyst(s)
body:
Enclave is currently looking for any analyst(s) to aid us with our preparation for OOL and OCS Qualification.

The role of an analyst would be to provide feedback on gameplay and give opinions on any strategies the team may implement. There will be a large focus on Pick/Ban related analysis and scouting.

Current Roster
Top - Enclave Reaper
Jungle - El Gimp
Mid - Enclave OnePunch
AD - L8S
Support - Enclave Blyth

Desired qualifications
- Extensive LoL game knowledge
- Strong communication skills
- Ability to consistently and accurately convey information
- Prior analyst experience highly desired but not required
- Above 18 years of age also preferred

The correct candidate(s) will communicate with the team and the coach as often as possible and be a part of team discussion when necessary.

Email any applications to charliewraith@outlook.com
Add Enclave Pinch or Enclave Arrow ingame for any further questions
Send all applications through email, not ingame

Feel free to attach any prior work in the email to increase your chances!
